thread.title: Blac Chyna drug charges 'dropped' after star was arrested at a US airport early last year
thread.title_full: Blac Chyna drug charges 'dropped' after star was arrested at a US airport early last year

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Blac Chyna drug charges 'dropped' after star was arrested at a US airport early last year
text:
Celebs Blac Chyna drug charges 'dropped' after star was arrested at a US airport early last year The mum-of-two was arrested at the Austin-Bergstrom International Airport back in January as she tried to board a flight to London Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The drug charges against Blac Chyna have been dropped, according to US reports. 
The model was arrested for public intoxication and possession of a controlled substance at the Austin International Airport in Texas last January after officers discovered the drugs when called to the scene after she became abusive to airline staff. 
The reality star was due to board a flight to London. Blac Chyna on Instagram (Photo: Instagram/Blacchyna) 
According to a police affidavit obtained by PEOPLE at the time, officers discovered two white pills inside a sunglasses case (she said she didn't know what they were) and after testing they were revealed to be methylenedioxy-methamphetamine, known as ecstasy. 
Police said she was "going from extremely angry, cursing at everyone then to crying" during the incident. Dream Kardashian (Photo: snapchat/blacchyna) 
According to TMZ, prosecuters dropped the charge because she had been on her best behaviour since the arrest and she completed a "sufficient amount" of classes. 
The website also reports that because it was a non-violent offence, they also dismissed it. 
After her release, Rob Kardashian, drove 1,377 miles from Los Angeles to Austin to pick her up. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
